meta.name: description
meta.content: Washington Global Public Charter School is a tuition-free middle school open to all students in Washington, DC offering a robust international and research-based academic program to develop globally competitive students who are ready for college and careers.

img.title: Home
img.rs-layer: A robust international and research-based academic program to develop globally competitive students who are ready for college and careers.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row section vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1526025235376 grid_section

div.h1: A Rigorous, Internationally-based Academic and Cultural Curriculum

div.h5: Our program includes project-based learning, small learning communities, technology instruction, arts, and foreign language classes in Spanish.

img.alt: Leveraging technology to provide essential skills

div.img: Leveraging technology to provide essential skills Washington Global PCS utilizes the very latest digital tools and cutting-edge software to enrich student learning—resulting in increased educational productivity, reducing costs associated with instructional materials or program delivery, and better utilizing teacher time.

img.alt: Programs to keep kids healthy and active

div.img: Programs to keep kids healthy and active Our program includes project-based learning, small learning communities, technology instruction, and intensive foreign language classes. We strive for all of our students to be healthy and active through our nutrition, physical education, and athletic programs.

International middle years curriculum (IMYC) The IMYC offers interactive, stimulating, real-world, project-based learning delivered through thematic units such as resilience, entrepreneurship, and creativity. These themes drive our Global Citizenship course and are woven across subject areas.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row section vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1525961763455 grid_section

div.h1: A Faculty Dedicated to Creating A Culture of Success

div.h5: Teachers and Faculty at Washington Global PCS are using strategies to engage students in the social, emotional, and academic learning that happens in middle school.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row section vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1524823347423 grid_section

div.p: Fill out this form and someone from the school will get back to you shortly.

525 School Street SWWashington, DC 20024
For all inquiries, please email info@washingtonglobal.org or call (202) 796-2415
Washington Global students will be in session beginning August 26, 2019 and will follow the Daily Schedule.

Washington Global participates in the My School DC lottery. All students interested in applying for Washington Global should visit the My School DC page at www.myschooldc.org, fill out the application, and choose Washington Global as their top choice

div.class: vc_row wpb_row section vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1524824108928 grid_section

div.h1:
Unique flexibility matched by strong accountability
and high standards

div.p: "For years, charter schools have brought new ideas to the work of educating our sons and daughters. Whether created by parents and teachers or community and civic leaders, charter schools serve as incubators of innovation in neighborhoods across our country."

div.class: vc_row wpb_row section vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1524832165144 grid_section

Washington Global Public Charter School is a tuition-free middle school open to all students in Washington, DC offering a robust international and research-based academic program to develop globally competitive students who are ready for college and careers.
